options.responseText: Mmm... go away before I dream-punch you.

followUpOptions.responseText: Mmm... let them win... sounds easier... zzz...

followUpOptions.optionText: Get up or I’ll tell the Overseer!
followUpOptions.responseText: Tell him I’m too fabulous to wake up... zzz...

options.optionText: Enjoy your nap while I do all the work.
